title: ICE with borrow checker in nightly

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
ICE with the borrow checker on nightly. Tried on stable/beta and it correctly errors with
```
tx.send(Event::Rpc(response(resp.id))).unwrap();
   |                                             ^^^^^^^ cannot move out of borrowed content
```
in nightly, I get
```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.37.0-nightly (8aa42ed7c 2019-06-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C linker=clang -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld --crate-type bin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden
```
## Code
```rust
use std::sync::mpsc;

pub enum Event {
    Rpc(JsonRpc),
}

pub enum Id {
    Str(String),
}

pub fn response<I: Into<Id>>(id: I) -> JsonRpc {
    JsonRpc::Response(Response {
        id: id.into(),
        method: "request".into(),
    })
}

struct Response {
    id: Id,
    method: String,
}

pub enum JsonRpc {
    Response(Response),
}

fn main() {
    let (tx, rx) = mpsc::channel();
    for evt in rx {
        match evt {
            Event::Rpc(JsonRpc::Response(ref resp)) if resp.method == "shutdown" => {}
            Event::Rpc(JsonRpc::Response(ref resp)) if resp.method == "request" => {
                tx.send(Event::Rpc(response(resp.id))).unwrap();
            }
            _ => (),
        };
    }
}

```

https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=45bda3f34fa2a19e826f1e1be88711a7

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```

commit-date: 2019-06-24
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.37.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
```
